content: marshmallow knitting pattern jenny church 3mm straight needles pink and wite dk yarn brown dk yarn black yarn for embroidery faces k-knit p purl kfb knit front and back k2tog knit 2 together p2tog purl 2 together b&t break yarn and pull through stitches to bind off body cast on 8 stitches 1 p 8 2 kfbx8 16 3 p 16 4 kfb k1 x 8 24 5 7 p 24 8 10 12 14 16 k 24 9 11 13 15 17 18 19 p 24 20 k2tog k1 x 8 16 21 p 16 22 k2tog x8 8 23 purl 8 b&t to make up sew all seams leaving space for stuffing gather stitches from cast on and cast off embroider face legs make 2 for each marshmallow cast on 8 stitches 1 p 8 2 k2togx4 4 3 p2tog 2 4 k 2 5 p 2 b&t to make up gather cast on stitches with cast on yarn and then sew up row ends
